document.full_text: president barack obama, basking in u.s. public approval for the killing of osama bin laden, flew to a military base in kentucky on friday to thank special forces who carried out the deadly raid and led a rally filled with cheering troops.
document.title: obama pays tribute to unit in bin laden raid
lines_and_colors: president barack obama, basking in u.s. public approval for the killing of osama bin laden, flew to a military base in kentucky on friday to thank special forces who carried out the deadly raid and led a rally filled with cheering troops.
